tool_description: This API would fetch all stocks giving out dividends
name: indian-stock-dividends-api
title: indian-stock-dividends-api

api_list.name: Get Latest  declared dividend companies greater than current date
api_list.description: Get  Dividend Companies greater than current date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian-stock-dividends-api.p.rapidapi.com/stocks/latest/dividends"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian-stock-dividends-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
